word_mean: 血管舒张：血管的扩张，尤指小动脉扩张导致进入某一器官的血流增加

sentence.Network_en: Vasodilation and sweating dissipate heat through radiation and conduction from the skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 血管舒张和出汗通过皮肤的辐射和传导散热.

sentence.Network_en: Vasodilation: leads to greater blood flow to the area of inflammation, resulting in redness and heat.
sentence.Network_cn: 血管扩张: 炎症灶血流量增加使得局部红、热.

sentence.Network_en: Endocrine effects and unspecific reactions may contribute to L - arginine - induced vasodilation after higher doses.
sentence.Network_cn: 提高剂量时,内分泌效应及非特异性反应皆可导致精氨酸诱发之血管扩张.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学英语 ... Vasoconstriction 血管收缩 Vasodilation 血管舒张 Vector of infection 传染媒介.
鱼类的鳃有肾上腺素能神经分布,亦有α和β肾上腺素能的受体,刺激α-受体能使血管收缩(vasoconstriction),刺激β-受体能使血管扩张(vasodilation)。已经证明儿茶酚胺.
ultrasonic measurement of vasodilation in cerebral infarction patients ., 超声测定脑梗死患者血管舒张功能.
